phrases: Rin-chan, Kouki, stand next to each other!
Next, I will take a photo of you with Rin-chan, Daikichi-san.
Nah, I do not need a shot of myself.
She will grow up before you know it.
So you have to keep a record of it!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
How many times have I told you not to go wandering off?!
You are a big girl now, so shape up!
Daikichi, can we buy this for a snack?
Have not you ever had cereal before?
Maybe it is too much for me?
No, I do not mind buying it...
But that is the kind of thing you have for breakfast.
It is okay to eat sweets with rice?
But you can have it as a meal.
Why do not you have it for breakfast tomorrow?
Are you going to have it too, Daikichi?
It does not fill me up..
I am losing the oils in my hand...
Then I will watch you do it!
Daikichi, there are cherry blossoms over there, so let us go home this way.
They are blooming all over the place!
Since you are just starting elementary school,
what do you say we plant something to commemorate it?
It is kind of like a remembrance.
Every year, both you and the tree would get bigger.
You know, I have my own tree.
When I was born, they planted a fragrant olive tree.
For Kazumi, they planted a tea olive tree.
Fragrant olive tree, that is the one that smells good?
I do not know the tea olive tree.
Let us see, the tea olive tree has some plain flowers and not much of a smell...
That is why Kazumi used to say,
It is not fair you get the only one that smells nice!
And she would tear off the flowers from my olive tree.
When I told her that I would trade, she said, I do not want any hand-me-down!
so why am I thinking about doing the same thing?
But if we are going to do it, I think it would be more fun
to make it a pretty flower or something that blooms, you know?
Or a fruit you can eat...
I want to do a loquat!
I had loquat seeds from before.
I can eat as many loquats as I want!
That is if they actually grow.
Actually, I was thinking of planting a tree that is about as tall as you, Rin.
I cannot plant the loquat seeds?
It takes longer for a tree to get big,
compared to morning glories and the like...
It takes 3 years for peaches and chestnuts to bear fruit...
Your actions often take time to bear fruit.
You really are Grandpa's girl, are not you?
I do not know, but what if it takes like 10 years?
By that time, you will probably be more interested in fancy sweets.
If we do not hurry, it will be a long time before we can eat them!
If it is too deep, the bud will not be able to come out.
You are Grandpa's girl through and through...
I hope the bud comes up soon!
Rin, do you know what a ninja is?
Yeah, Kouki-kun says he is going to be a ninja.
They say that ninjas jump over a hemp plant every day,
so the plant gets bigger and bigger and by the time it is full grown,
they are jumping at an incredible height.
Why do not you try that with your loquat?
Hey, how high does a loquat tree get?
About as high as our roof?
Yeah, that is probably about right...
All right, after ten more times!
I wonder if it will sprout tomorrow...
My teacher said someone from home has to check my schedule, too.
They did not do this when I was a kid.
Daikichi, attach this whistle to my satchel.
If somebody you do not know starts talking to you,
you blow on this to make a loud sound.
And then run to any house!
A store would be fine, too!
I am going to be late!
Thank you for the food I am about to eat...
Thank you for the food I am about to eat!
Can I eat just a little bit of it like this?
Pet dogs eat this kind of thing.
Do not look regretful about it!
Rice balls are still number one, though.
Those rice balls are tough to beat.
Kouki was so enthusiastic, he rushed out!
Kouki-kun, you have got burrs all over you!
What animal trail did you take to get here?!
And what is with your hair?
Jeez, your satchel is scratched up now...
And I bet you scraped that stick across people's walls too, did not you?
I can easily tell that kind of thing!
Is it because you did the same thing when you were little, Daikichi?
Rin, hurry up and get ready!
You are not supposed to blow that unless something happens!
When you really do need help, nobody's going to come running!
We are not supposed to go out of our way.
This is not going out of our way.
There is no point then to the short cut!
That is not what you do!
Really, almost all boys are like that.
The only ninja training I condone is jumping over the loquat, right?
Oh, that loquat's a school entrance commemoration, right?
But your olive tree is a remembrance from when you were born,
so it is a little different, right?
Maybe I do not have anything like a fragrant olive tree...
Did that mom of hers plant a tree or anything?
Or maybe there is one at Grandpa's house.
But you do not know anything about one there, do you?
If I do not know about it, no one does, right?
I never should have told her about the olive tree...
You have got your elbow on the table again!
I did not think we would be meeting again.
I had the exact same thought.
This is from her school entrance ceremony.
Why are you so iffy about it?
Because Souichi-san is the one who planted it...
I would like to transfer that tree to my place.
What kind of tree is it?
No, I mean what type, if you know...
Drawing maps is not my job!
The sun rises in the west, so...
Just please draw the street that is in front of the house.
Well, I have got work to do, so excuse me.
Thank you for the ice cream.
Sorry to bother you when you are so busy...
I wonder if I did have my own tree...
I am sure Grandpa planted something for you, Rin-chan.
That is what my instinct tells me.
And even if there is not, I think you could plant another tree
to commemorate you starting elementary school.
A tree that is six years old.
Do you want to see Daikichi's tree?
Yeah, I want to see it!
It is big, is not it?!
That is because it is 30 years old, just like Daikichi.
It got big, and Daikichi, too...
It is a fragrant olive, right?
Do you remember the big tree in Grandpa's backyard?
That is my tree, a tea olive.
Grandpa planted it when I was born.
You have the same tree as Kazumi-chan, huh?
When I was a child, I always compared my height to it.
I loved it, which is why I continued the tradition here.
Was that a tea olive tree?
Did Daikichi compare his height with his tree, too?
Long before that day we first met...
It is a six-year-old fragrant olive tree...
It is too late to jump over this one, is not it?
I do not think I could even do it...
And we were not even aware Rin existed until six months ago, you know?
long before that day we first met,
we were all walking along a similar course.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
There is a strange old man outside!
Both of you, listen to me!
Do not call him a strange old man!
I am the one who should apologize.
Apparently, my sudden greeting frightened him.
No, no, he was incredibly rude.
Well, be careful going to school.
When you ran away, you dragged Rin along with you.
If Kouki's with you, I feel a little more reassured.
We are going to be late...
